# OASR (Open Agent Skill Registry)

> OASR is a CLI tool that provides a local registry for centralized management of agent skills across multiple workspaces, agentic providers, and remote hosting environments.

---

## Agent Instructions

Use the links below as the recommended progressive disclosure entrypoints.

## Documentation Index

- [README](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JordanGunn/asr/refs/heads/master/README.md): Overview, execution model, and quick start.
- [Documentation Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JordanGunn/asr/refs/heads/master/docs/.INDEX.md): Comprehensive documentation index.
